019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
022import io.kubernetes.client.custom.Quantity;
023import io.kubernetes.client.custom.Quantity.Format;
024import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
025import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.ApisApi;
026import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.CustomObjectsApi;
027import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.EventsV1Api;
028import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.EventsV1Event;
029import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1APIGroup;
030import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1GroupVersionForDiscovery;
031import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ObjectMeta;
032import io.kubernetes.client.util.Config;
033import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesApi;
034import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
035import java.io.IOException;
036import java.math.BigDecimal;
037import java.nio.file.Files;
038import java.nio.file.Path;
039import java.time.Instant;
040import java.time.OffsetDateTime;
041import java.util.Map;
042import java.util.Optional;
043import java.util.Set;
044import java.util.logging.Level;
045import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.APP_NAME;
046import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.VM_OP_GROUP;
047import static org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.Constants.VM_OP_KIND_VM;
048import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common.K8s;
049import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.BalloonChangeEvent;
050import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.Exit;
051import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.HotpluggableCpuStatus;
052import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerConfigurationUpdate;
053import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerStateChange;
054import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.runner.qemu.events.RunnerStateChange.State;
055import org.jdrupes.vmoperator.util.GsonPtr;
056import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
057import org.jgrapes.core.Component;
058import org.jgrapes.core.annotation.Handler;
059import org.jgrapes.core.events.HandlingError;
060import org.jgrapes.core.events.Start;
061import org.jgrapes.util.events.ConfigurationUpdate;
062import org.jgrapes.util.events.InitialConfiguration;
063
064/**
065 * Updates the CR status.
066 */
067@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis")
068public class StatusUpdater extends Component {
069
070    private static final Set<State> RUNNING_STATES
071        = Set.of(State.RUNNING, State.TERMINATING);
072
073    private String namespace;
074    private String vmName;
075    private DynamicKubernetesApi vmCrApi;
076    private EventsV1Api evtsApi;
077    private long observedGeneration;
078
079    /**
080     * Instantiates a new status updater.
081     *
082     * @param componentChannel the component channel
083     */
084    public StatusUpdater(Channel componentChannel) {
085        super(componentChannel);
086    }
087
088    /**
089     * On handling error.
090     *
091     * @param event the event
092     */
093    @Handler(channels = Channel.class)
094    public void onHandlingError(HandlingError event) {
095        if (event.throwable() instanceof ApiException exc) {
096            logger.log(Level.WARNING, exc,
097                () -> "Problem accessing kubernetes: " + exc.getResponseBody());
098            event.stop();
099        }
100    }
101
102    /**
103     * On configuration update.
104     *
105     * @param event the event
106     */
107    @Handler
108    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
109    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
110        event.structured("/Runner").ifPresent(c -> {
111            if (event instanceof InitialConfiguration) {
112                namespace = (String) c.get("namespace");
113                updateNamespace();
114                vmName = Optional.ofNullable((Map<String, String>) c.get("vm"))
115                    .map(vm -> vm.get("name")).orElse(null);
116            }
117        });
118    }
119
120    private void updateNamespace() {
121        if (namespace == null) {
122            var path = Path
123                .of("/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount/namespace");
124            if (Files.isReadable(path)) {
125                try {
126                    namespace = Files.lines(path).findFirst().orElse(null);
127                } catch (IOException e) {
128                    logger.log(Level.WARNING, e,
129                        () -> "Cannot read namespace.");
130                }
131            }
132        }
133        if (namespace == null) {
134            logger.warning(() -> "Namespace is unknown, some functions"
135                + " won't be available.");
136        }
137    }
138
139    /**
140     * Handle the start event.
141     *
142     * @param event the event
143     * @throws IOException 
144     * @throws ApiException 
145     */
146    @Handler
147    public void onStart(Start event) {
148        if (namespace == null) {
149            return;
150        }
151        try {
152            initVmCrApi(event);
153        } catch (IOException | ApiException e) {
154            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
155                () -> "Cannot access VM's CR, terminating.");
156            event.cancel(true);
157            fire(new Exit(1));
158        }
159        try {
160            evtsApi = new EventsV1Api(Config.defaultClient());
161        } catch (IOException e) {
162            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
163                () -> "Cannot access events API, terminating.");
164            event.cancel(true);
165            fire(new Exit(1));
166        }
167    }
168
169    private void initVmCrApi(Start event) throws IOException, ApiException {
170        var client = Config.defaultClient();
171        var apis = new ApisApi(client).getAPIVersions();
172        var crdVersions = apis.getGroups().stream()
173            .filter(g -> g.getName().equals(VM_OP_GROUP)).findFirst()
174            .map(V1APIGroup::getVersions).stream().flatMap(l -> l.stream())
175            .map(V1GroupVersionForDiscovery::getVersion).toList();
176        var coa = new CustomObjectsApi(client);
177        for (var crdVersion : crdVersions) {
178            var crdApiRes = coa.getAPIResources(VM_OP_GROUP,
179                crdVersion).getResources().stream()
180                .filter(r -> VM_OP_KIND_VM.equals(r.getKind())).findFirst();
181            if (crdApiRes.isEmpty()) {
182                continue;
183            }
184            @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
185            var crApi = new DynamicKubernetesApi(VM_OP_GROUP,
186                crdVersion, crdApiRes.get().getName(), client);
187            var vmCr = crApi.get(namespace, vmName);
188            if (vmCr.isSuccess()) {
189                vmCrApi = crApi;
190                observedGeneration
191                    = vmCr.getObject().getMetadata().getGeneration();
192                break;
193            }
194        }
195        if (vmCrApi == null) {
196            logger.severe(() -> "Cannot find VM's CR, terminating.");
197            event.cancel(true);
198            fire(new Exit(1));
199        }
200    }
201
202    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals")
203    private JsonObject currentStatus(DynamicKubernetesObject vmCr) {
204        return vmCr.getRaw().getAsJsonObject("status").deepCopy();
205    }
206
207    /**
208     * On runner configuration update.
209     *
210     * @param event the event
211     * @throws ApiException 
212     */
213    @Handler
214    public void onRunnerConfigurationUpdate(RunnerConfigurationUpdate event)
215            throws ApiException {
216        if (vmCrApi == null) {
217            return;
218        }
219        // A change of the runner configuration is typically caused
220        // by a new version of the CR. So we observe the new CR.
221        var vmCr = vmCrApi.get(namespace, vmName).throwsApiException()
222            .getObject();
223        if (vmCr.getMetadata().getGeneration() == observedGeneration) {
224            return;
225        }
226        vmCrApi.updateStatus(vmCr, from -> {
227            JsonObject status = currentStatus(from);
228            status.getAsJsonArray("conditions").asList().stream()
229                .map(cond -> (JsonObject) cond).filter(cond -> "Running"
230                    .equals(cond.get("type").getAsString()))
231                .forEach(cond -> cond.addProperty("observedGeneration",
232                    from.getMetadata().getGeneration()));
233            return status;
234        });
235    }
236
237    /**
238     * On runner state changed.
239     *
240     * @param event the event
241     * @throws ApiException 
242     */
243    @Handler
244    public void onRunnerStateChanged(RunnerStateChange event)
245            throws ApiException {
246        if (vmCrApi == null) {
247            return;
248        }
249        var vmCr = vmCrApi.get(namespace, vmName).throwsApiException()
250            .getObject();
251        vmCrApi.updateStatus(vmCr, from -> {
252            JsonObject status = currentStatus(from);
253            status.getAsJsonArray("conditions").asList().stream()
254                .map(cond -> (JsonObject) cond)
255                .forEach(cond -> {
256                    if ("Running".equals(cond.get("type").getAsString())) {
257                        updateRunningCondition(event, from, cond);
258                    }
259                });
260            if (event.state() == State.STARTING) {
261                status.addProperty("ram", GsonPtr.to(from.getRaw())
262                    .getAsString("spec", "vm", "maximumRam").orElse("0"));
263                status.addProperty("cpus", 1);
264            } else if (event.state() == State.STOPPED) {
265                status.addProperty("ram", "0");
266                status.addProperty("cpus", 0);
267            }
268            return status;
269        }).throwsApiException();
270
271        // Log event
272        var evt = new EventsV1Event().kind("Event")
273            .metadata(new V1ObjectMeta().namespace(namespace)
274                .generateName("vmrunner-"))
275            .reportingController(VM_OP_GROUP + "/" + APP_NAME)
276            .reportingInstance(vmCr.getMetadata().getName())
277            .eventTime(OffsetDateTime.now()).type("Normal")
278            .regarding(K8s.objectReference(vmCr))
279            .action("StatusUpdate").reason(event.reason())
280            .note(event.message());
281        evtsApi.createNamespacedEvent(namespace, evt, null, null, null, null);
282    }
283
284    private void updateRunningCondition(RunnerStateChange event,
285            DynamicKubernetesObject from, JsonObject cond) {
286        boolean reportedRunning
287            = "True".equals(cond.get("status").getAsString());
288        if (RUNNING_STATES.contains(event.state())
289            && !reportedRunning) {
290            cond.addProperty("status", "True");
291            cond.addProperty("lastTransitionTime",
292                Instant.now().toString());
293        }
294        if (!RUNNING_STATES.contains(event.state())
295            && reportedRunning) {
296            cond.addProperty("status", "False");
297            cond.addProperty("lastTransitionTime",
298                Instant.now().toString());
299        }
300        cond.addProperty("reason", event.reason());
301        cond.addProperty("message", event.message());
302        cond.addProperty("observedGeneration",
303            from.getMetadata().getGeneration());
304    }
305
306    /**
307     * On ballon change.
308     *
309     * @param event the event
310     * @throws ApiException 
311     */
312    @Handler
313    public void onBallonChange(BalloonChangeEvent event) throws ApiException {
314        if (vmCrApi == null) {
315            return;
316        }
317        var vmCr = vmCrApi.get(namespace, vmName).throwsApiException()
318            .getObject();
319        vmCrApi.updateStatus(vmCr, from -> {
320            JsonObject status = currentStatus(from);
321            status.addProperty("ram",
322                new Quantity(new BigDecimal(event.size()), Format.BINARY_SI)
323                    .toSuffixedString());
324            return status;
325        }).throwsApiException();
326    }
327
328    /**
329     * On ballon change.
330     *
331     * @param event the event
332     * @throws ApiException 
333     */
334    @Handler
335    public void onCpuChange(HotpluggableCpuStatus event) throws ApiException {
336        if (vmCrApi == null) {
337            return;
338        }
339        var vmCr = vmCrApi.get(namespace, vmName).throwsApiException()
340            .getObject();
341        vmCrApi.updateStatus(vmCr, from -> {
342            JsonObject status = currentStatus(from);
343            status.addProperty("cpus", event.usedCpus().size());
344            return status;
345        }).throwsApiException();
346    }
347}
